required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Different Periodontal Plastic Surgery Techniques for Gummy Smile Treatment
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Different Periodontal Plastic Surgery Techniques for Gummy Smile Treatment

lead_sponsor.agency: Egas Moniz - Cooperativa de Ensino Superior, CRL

clinical_study.source: Egas Moniz - Cooperativa de Ensino Superior, CRL

brief_summary.textblock: Investigating different periodontal surgery techniques to treat gummy smile.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Superior incisors proportion (height x length)
Change in Exposure of central incisors at rest
primary_outcome.description: Measurement between incisal border of central incisors and the border of the lower lip during smile (in millimeters)
Three probes (mesial, buccal and distal) for exposed teeth during smile

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Gengiva exposure at rest and forced smile
primary_outcome.description: When lips are in rest position measure the amount of exposed gingiva and during a forced smile, make the same measure

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Interlabial space at rest
primary_outcome.description: When in rest position, measure distance between lips

arm_group.arm_group_label: Subjects with gummy smile and with upper lip hypermobility
arm_group.description: Periodontal plastic surgery for peek device implantation with 4 screws in the anterior maxillary area

arm_group.arm_group_label: Subjects with gummy smile and with short teeth and upper lip hypermobility
arm_group.description: Gingivectomy/crown lengthening and device implantation in the anterior maxillary area. First crown lengthening procedure (CLP) will be performed creating a distance of 3mm between cementoenamel junction (CEJ). Next peek device will be position with 4 screws

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patiens who refuse device implantation - control group

intervention.description: Participants with gummy smile will be recruited from the Dental Clinic of Instituto Universitário Egas Moniz
intervention.arm_group_label: Subjects with gummy smile and with short teeth and upper lip hypermobility
Subjects with gummy smile and with upper lip hypermobility

intervention.description: Participante with gummy smile will be recruited from the Dental Clinic of Instituto Universitário Egas Moniz
intervention.arm_group_label: Patiens who refuse device implantation - control group

facility.name: Egas Moniz Cooperativa de Ensino Superior
